definition: Our mission is to make professionals work worthwhile
context: Our mission is to make professionals work worthwhile

definition: When we were in our previous jobs, we realized that in almost all the topics we were carrying, it was usual to ask for information, it being usual for customers to take a long time to send the information we needed to work.
context: When we were in our previous jobs, we realized that in almost all the topics we were carrying, it was usual to ask for information, it being usual for customers to take a long time to send the information we needed to work.

definition: That information we requested was essential to start working.
context: That information we requested was essential to start working.

definition: When asking other professionals, many agreed that this same situation often happened to them. It did not matter if at the time of requesting the information we left it beautiful and easily understood, customers rarely responded to the email with all the information.
context: When asking other professionals, many agreed that this same situation often happened to them. It did not matter if at the time of requesting the information we left it beautiful and easily understood, customers rarely responded to the email with all the information.

definition: It was common for customers to send the information with an eyedropper or forget to send certain documents. This forced us to constantly chase customers so that we could have all the information.
context: It was common for customers to send the information with an eyedropper or forget to send certain documents. This forced us to constantly chase customers so that we could have all the information.

definition: We began to investigate what tools in the market could solve that situation and not seeing any tool that solved it well and in a simple way we decided to solve it ourselves.
context: We began to investigate what tools in the market could solve that situation and not seeing any tool that solved it well and in a simple way we decided to solve it ourselves.

definition: At that time Parallel was born.
context: At that time Parallel was born.

definition: Parallel is a technology company that builds the next generation tools for professionals daily tasks.
context: Parallel is a technology company that builds the next generation tools for professionals daily tasks.

definition: Basic functions of our platform: petitions, contacts and document management.
context: Basic functions of our platform: petitions, contacts and document management.

definition: How to send a checklist: to several recipients, types of information fields.
context: How to send a checklist: to several recipients, types of information fields.

definition: Follow the status of your requests: progress, delivery and read receipts.
context: Follow the status of your requests: progress, delivery and read receipts.

definition: Reviewing and downloading received information: review completed checklists and download documents.
context: Reviewing and downloading received information: review completed checklists and download documents.

definition: In this demo we will explain:
context: In this demo we will explain:

definition: All the information always available in a single place on the cloud.
context: All the information always available in a single place on the cloud.

definition: The convenience for her clients, who now can upload their files at any time and from any device.
context: The convenience for her clients, who now can upload their files at any time and from any device.

definition: In just one month, Laura has managed to increase her billable hours and an additional net income of 1,500 per month.
context: In just one month, Laura has managed to increase her billable hours and an additional net income of 1,500 per month.

definition: All these tasks add up to more than 20 hours a month that Laura cannot bill to her clients.
context: All these tasks add up to more than 20 hours a month that Laura cannot bill to her clients.

definition: Laura has recently discovered Parallel and is regaining almost an hour a day.
context: Laura has recently discovered Parallel and is regaining almost an hour a day.

definition: If you want to start using Parallel for free, register here.
context: If you want to start using Parallel for free, register here.

definition: The peace of mind about not having to chase clients, because Parallel does it for her.
context: The peace of mind about not having to chase clients, because Parallel does it for her.

definition: Laura spends more than an hour everyday requesting information and reviewing emails to make sure she has all the documents she needs to start her work.
context: Laura spends more than an hour everyday requesting information and reviewing emails to make sure she has all the documents she needs to start her work.

context: You can use Parallel if you work in a law firm, accounting firm or startup.

definition: Discover everything you can do with our platform.
context: Discover everything you can do with our platform.

context: Leading digital transformation in their companies

context: Parallel is a platform for busy professionals. We collect all the documentation from your client for you safely and quickly.

context: We automate the information request process. Your client will not know that it is not you who sends the emails.

context: In 3 easy steps you can create a request with the documentation you need your client to send you.

definition: How do we protect your data and information?
context: How do we protect your data and information?

definition: We will never store your passwords as you type them, you can only reset them by means that allow us to verify your credentials.
context: We will never store your passwords as you type them, you can only reset them by means that allow us to verify your credentials.

definition: At Parallel we maintain security as one of our fundamental pillars. We know that trust is the foundation of any relationship. For this reason, we protect you and the people with whom you interact.
context: At Parallel we maintain security as one of our fundamental pillars. We know that trust is the foundation of any relationship. For this reason, we protect you and the people with whom you interact.

context: How do we protect your clients' information?

definition: You can safely access your files from any computer, and all communications and requests for information will be kept safe from third parties.
context: You can safely access your files from any computer, and all communications and requests for information will be kept safe from third parties.

definition: We use SSL (Secure Sockets Layer) to protect data in transit between the Parallel application in your browser and our servers.
context: We use SSL (Secure Sockets Layer) to protect data in transit between the Parallel application in your browser and our servers.

definition: To achieve this, our system has multiple layers of protection and is secure by design.
context: To achieve this, our system has multiple layers of protection and is secure by design.

definition: Trust Parallel to keep all your information safe and confidential.
context: Trust Parallel to keep all your information safe and confidential.

definition: In addition, no one will be able to access upload pages to download or view information without first identifying themselves.
context: In addition, no one will be able to access upload pages to download or view information without first identifying themselves.
